Articles.Content:
Hello i was thinking of random things i could challenge people to do and i thought of red planet

Im thinking make the space station type ship from Red Planet(2000) known as Mars-1

Mods are ok since some parts of the Mars-1 are already KSP mods like the rear panels

Oh well but if you guys can make it ill be impressed and an extra challenge is to make it to Duna with it

Somebody just delete this it is not gonna be made and i have another post involving the Mars-1 in the mod requests so this is pretty useless

Edited June 15, 2013 by Knight123
pix pls (I have no idea what that looks like), and lets see your own attempt.
Why not extend the challenge to all fictional crafts?

Why not extend the challenge to all fictional crafts?

Not much of a challenge, then. More of a "do whatever you want" free-for-all. Nothing wrong with that, but not the best for a competition.
Especially with no clear way to "win", I think this needs more thought Knight123

Anyways - I got bored and after 20 minutes of tinkering I came up with this atmospheric version of a Space: Above and Beyond Hammerhead

It does fly....but don't ask how...
